titles.title: Act to Restore Fair Competition in the Ocean Shipping Industry
A bill to amend the Sherman Act to restore fair competition in the ocean shipping industry.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14704-14705)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/29/1993--Introduced. Act to Restore Fair Competition in the Ocean Shipping Industry - Amends the Sherman Act to repeal the exemption from the antitrust laws provided under the Shipping Act of 1984, insofar as it applies to ocean common carriers.
